title: Blue Patches seen on screen when in use
content:
It's been 5 months and 10 days, since I got my Pixel 3a xl from FLIPKART. Am in love with the device. Today I was extremely disappointed to notice BLUE spots (irregularly shaped), on bottom and bottom right of my screen, when in use.

2 Pics here....

Don't know how it happened. Never dropped phone, never overcharged, never any moisture.....etc..Took care like a prize.
